name: AddNewDomainVercel
description:
Add a new apex domain with Vercel for the user.

Use this tool to add a new apex domain name with Vercel for the authenticating user. This tool is not meant for transferring domains from external registrars to Vercel.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Team on whose behalf the request is made.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The identifier for the team to execute the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: domain_operation
parameters.description: JSON object specifying the domain operation, including 'method' with values 'add' or 'move-in'.

method.description: The domain operation to perform. It can be either `add` or `move-in`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

method.description: The domain operation to perform. It can be either `add` or `move-in`.
